news.title: ED attaches assets worth over Rs 3 crore in bank fraud case involving Supergold Pipes
news.para: These properties were attached on Jan 27 under the provisions of the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA), 2002, with regard to an alleged bank fraud case involving M/s Supergold Pipes Pvt Ltd.

news.title: Ludhiana civic body to launch unique ID plates for properties
news.para: Under the UID plate project, the MC is aiming to create a database for properties in the city, be it residential, industrial or commercial. To achieve this, the MC had earlier conducted a survey of properties with the help of Punjab Remote Sensing Centre.

news.title: Mindspace REIT acquires 1.82 million sq ft office space in Hyderabad for Rs 2,038 crore
news.para: The commercial asset has been acquired for Rs 2,038 crore. The board of directors of K Raheja Corp Investment Managers, manager to Mindspace REIT, has approved the acquisition and preferential issue of units aggregating up to Rs 613 crore.

news.title: Indore civic body faces housing shortage for families affected by development projects
news.para: As per the official data, IMC identified a total of 2,875 residential, commercial, and industrial lands as hurdles in the construction of 22 roads, along with 97 religious structures.

news.title: Madras HC says government to decide on metro extension to Melur
news.para: Chennai Metro Rail Limited (CMRL), which was appointed as the implementing agency, completed the work of preparing a detailed project report.

news.title: GNIDA planning to set up its second C&D waste processing plant in Astauli
news.para: The project, estimated to cost Rs 18.4 crore, aims to tackle the pressing issues of fresh and legacy waste management in the city.

news.title: Innov8 raises Rs 110 crore at Rs 1,000 crore valuation
news.para: Innov8 funding round was led by prominent family offices, including those of Mankind Pharma, Gauri Khan, Rupa Group and Jagruti Dalmia. Together, these investors accounted for 55% of the total funds raised.

news.title: Kolkata civic body to offer relief to owners of small plots by relaxing building rules
news.para: The move is aimed at stemming the mushrooming of illegal buildings across the city, some of which have come into focus in recent months, either because they have collapsed or tilted because they did not adhere to basic safety rules.

news.title: Arkade Developers acquires four acre land in Mumbai for Rs 165 crore
news.para: Arkade Developers' project will have an approximate saleable area exceeding five lakh sq ft, contributing an estimated revenue of Rs 2,000 crore. The land parcel is currently leased to Filmistan.

news.title: ED attaches properties worth Rs 30.5 crore of Kalpataru Group in PMLA probe
news.para: According to an official statement, all the immovable properties are in the form of Residential/commercial land and are situated at Mathura in Uttar Pradesh.

news.title: CCI approves Adani Group's 72.64% stake acquisition in ITD Cementation India
news.para: Dubai-incorporated Renew Exim DMCC will pick up 46.64%, or 8,01,13,180 shares, of ITD Cementation India, according to a statement by the antitrust regulator.

news.title: Noida authority approaches Delhi EOW against two more builders over Rs 825 crore dues
news.para: Accusing the promoters — Shubhkamna Buildtech and IVR Prime Developers — of misappropriating funds collected from the sale of apartments but not paying up their dues, Noida Authority argued that it not only caused big financial losses but also left homebuyers in distress.

news.title: HC approves private lift installation in multi-storey building in south Delhi
news.para: "The court is in agreement with the trial court's finding that the privacy concern must be balanced against the practical need for modern amenities such as lifts, especially in multi-storeyed residential buildings," HC said.

news.title: HDFC Bank leases 4.5 lakh sq ft office space in Mumbai
news.para: The mega lease deal will see the bank making a total rental payout of over Rs 1,020 crore including other charges through the entire term of the lease to the project developer Runwal Realty.

news.title: Banks can't seize buyers' flats for developer's default: West Bengal tribunal
news.para: The decision is seen as a landmark judgment, setting a precedent for protecting home-buyers' interests against banking institutions' recovery proceedings in real estate projects, reports Subhro Niyogi.

news.title: Home First Finance Company India's net profit up 23.55% in Q3 FY25
news.para: Home First Finance Company India's total income stood at Rs 407.45 crore in Q3 FY25, a growth of 35.36 per cent from Rs 301.01 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: RR Kabel's net profit dips 3.35% in Q3 FY25
news.para: RR Kabel's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,795.59 crore in Q3 FY25, a growth of 9.10 per cent from Rs 1,645.76 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Indian commercial real estate to grow 5-6% year-on-year in FY26: Ind-Ra
news.para: New office supply is expected to decline to about 52 million sq ft in FY26.

news.title: Average office deal size in NCR rises 29% year-on-year in 2024: Knight Frank India
news.para: The average deal size for the commercial market across eight leading markets in the country has increased by 14% from 37,976 sq ft in 2023 to 43,387 sq ft in 2024.

news.title: Bengaluru civic body to seek allocation of Rs 14,000 crore in Karnataka budget
news.para: While the civic body had presented a Rs 13,000-crore budget for 2024-25, this time it is expected to seek an allocation between Rs 13,000 crore and Rs 14,000 crore.
